Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
The game server class

    • TCP_PORT

      public static final int TCP_PORT
      The port on which the server is hosted
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run()
      Starts the server, and puts it in wait for connections for clients. When a client connects, generates two handler for it: to send messages, and to receive messages.

    • addNickname

      public static void addNickname​(java.lang.String s) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a player nickname to the server
      Parameters:
      s - the chosen nickname
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the nickname is already in use

    • removeNickname

      public static void removeNickname​(java.lang.String s)
      Frees a nickname from the server
      Parameters:
      s - the nickname to be removed

    • insertPlayerInGameRoom

      public static void insertPlayerInGameRoom​(int playerNumber, boolean allowedDivinities, java.lang.String name, java.util.Calendar Birthday, ViewInterface playerVirtualView)
      Inserts a player in a game room. Is a game room is available, adds the player in it, otherwise creates a new game room.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the number of players of the chosen game mode
      allowedDivinities - if divinities are allowed in the game
      name - the name of the added player
      Birthday - the player's birthday
      playerVirtualView - the players' virtualview

    • destroyGameRoom

      public static void destroyGameRoom​(int roomID, java.lang.String incriminatedPlayer, EndReason reason)
      Destroys a game room due to game end. Notifies all the players of the game end, with its reason.
      Parameters:
      roomID - the ID of the room to be deleted
      incriminatedPlayer - the player that provoked the game end
      reason - the reason why the game ended
